results.reasoning: north_arrow_angle = 0° (arrow points straight up on site plan page 3). This is an ADU - front is determined by entry door location, not street. North Elevation (page 6) shows the entry door D01 with covered porch. On site plan, the ADU's north-facing side (entry) faces toward the existing house and walkway, which is toward the lower-right of the page. front_drawing_angle ≈ 163° (SSE direction on page). Calculation: (163 - 0 + 360) % 360 = 163°

north_arrow_angle = 0° (arrow points straight up on site plan - essentially vertical). front_drawing_angle = 90° (entry/front faces right on site plan toward existing house and Canterbury Rd). Calculation: (90 - 0 + 360) % 360 = 90°. This is an SB-9 single-family dwelling with entry patio facing the existing house to the east.

north_arrow_angle = 330° (compass rose points upper-left, approximately 30° left of vertical). ADU entry identified on floor plan - ENTRY label shows front door facing downward on floor plan. FRONT elevation shows covered porch with entry. On site plan, ADU is in upper-right of lot with main house to lower-left. ADU front faces toward main house, which is lower-left on site plan. front_drawing_angle = 210° (lower-left direction). Calculation: (210 - 330 + 360) % 360 = 240°

north_arrow_angle = 340° (arrow points upper-left, approximately 20° left of vertical on Foundation Plan S1.0). ADU entry identified from floor plan (D-01 is 3'0" swing door on east side of building). Elevations show 'East Exterior Elevation' views. On site plan, ADU's east edge faces toward pool/main house area, pointing approximately 50° on the page (upper-right direction). Calculation: (50 - 340 + 360) % 360 = 70°. front_orientation = 70° (ENE).

north_arrow_angle = 340° (REFERENCE NORTH arrow on site plan points upper-left, approximately 20° left of vertical). front_drawing_angle = 315° (ADU entry is on North Elevation per sheet A2.1, which shows entry door with steps. On site plan, the ADU's north edge faces upper-left direction on page). Calculation: (315 - 340 + 360) % 360 = 335°. The entry faces NNW in true compass terms.
